author: Al Goodman and Tim Lister, CNN
title: Spain is battling black marketeers and price gougers
description: Ernesto Ruiz Lopez, a pharmacist in Madrid, says he's never seen anything like this. He can't get protective masks, gloves or hand sanitizer from his regular suppliers, because they won't pay the sky-high prices, increasing at every stage of the chain, to obt…
